name: Dungeon Cleaner
description:
Genre: Arcade / Puzzle

Engine:   Unity3D

Description:  You are the goblin who is responsible for cleaning up the dungeon: Activate traps, light up torches and remove corpses from the ground.

But be careful! Time is your enemy, because the next wave of heroes is coming!

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Space - Use
P - Pause
R - Restart
ESC - Quit

The game was made for the 1GAM June 2017 (Theme: CGA). Unfortunately we couldn't finish the game in time.
